thread.title: American Airlines adds eight new routes to Mexico, Latin America and the Caribbean
thread.title_full: American Airlines adds eight new routes to Mexico, Latin America and the Caribbean

author: Melissa Wylie
title: American Airlines adds eight new routes to Mexico, Latin America and the Caribbean
text: Jake Dean Fort Worth-based American Airlines plans to add eight new routes through Mexico, theâ€¦ more American Airlines (Nasdaq: AAL) plans to add eight new routes later this year that will include flights to Mexico, the Carribbean and Latin America. After receiving regulatory approval, travellers will be able to fly American to Mexico City and Mazatlan, Mexico; Quito, Ecuador; and several Caribbean countries, including Jamaica and Dominican Republic. The Fort Worth-based airline will offer connecting flights on the new routes in Charlotte, Chicago, Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport, Los Angeles and New York. More than 1,750 flights throughout Mexico, Latin America and the Caribbean will be available through American. Bizspace Spotlight
